list-item.p: 1Throughout this study we employ the term latent as used in computer science, i.e. referring to variables that are hidden, not directly observed, but rather inferred through a mathematical model. There is no reference to the medical use of the term that usually indicates an asymptomatic infection.
2In the results section, we report the mean and standard deviation of the symptoms discarded per country as well as the results of the framework with respect to including the duplicate reports.
